What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find. The wealthy feral humans became so elite that they transitioned into a human transformation unlike humans that we know today. Many creatures evolved from bats and cavemen to heavily designed extreme science fiction-costume looking creatures, Harm. Did the unthinkable happen? Could a disruption of the sort take place on Earth?
